channel.title: Player Talk - Player Dialoge

item.title: Player Talk - Player Dialoge
item.dc:creator: @rraayy rraayy
item.description:
@rraayy wrote:

I want to display player talking…
How to do that? I’ve got only NPC talking:

public void UpdateNPCChat(){//Npc Talking sendFrame126("", 976); switch (NpcDialogue){ case 1: talk("Npc Talking Text Here", NPC ID HERE); break; } }

public void talk(String text, int npc){ sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(npc), 4884); sendFrame126(text, 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886); sendFrame75(npc, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; }
How to make a player talk??? like this:

I use Delta… Plz help me

Read full topic
